title: [VISUAL BUG] Azir's Galactic Skin
body:
First off, this bug does not affect gameplay, nor does it distract me, but I noticed it yesterday and I thought it was worth mentioning.

[Azir's Buggy Skin](https://imgur.com/a/hGt6r)

At a first glance, this doesn't look to be anything at all, just a normal skin, no graphic errors at all. However, if you look close at his feathers behind him, you can see that at a certain point, the black lines on them just dont appear, and you are able to see Azir's (what I assume to be) hitbox. Again, this doesn't affect gameplay, but I noticed it and thought it ought to be said.

As far as I know, this glitch occurs in all versions of the game, but I couldn't be 100% sure. To recreate the bug, just select Azir's galactic skin and play and you should be able to see it. Though I couldn't get a good screenshot of his feathers and his weapon doing it at the same time, you can also see it there. To reiterate, I'm not sure if this happens for anyone else.

(Btw I tried just posting the screenshot here normally but for the life of me I can't figure out how.)

replies.body: Oh ok! Terribly sorry for the late reply v.v Good to know it's not just an error specific to his particular skin. Thanks for replying!
